locations.Fire Temple MQ Map Room Side Chest: is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or Slingshot or Bombs or can_use(Dins_Fire)
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Chest:
(can_use(Hover_Boots) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))) or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat))))) or
                (logic_fire_mq_near_boss and can_use(Bow) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))) or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat))))) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))) or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or
                        (can_live_dmg(0.75) and logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                            (three_heart_heat)) or
                        (can_use(Bow) and logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                            (three_heart_heat)) or
                        (can_use(Longshot) and logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                            (three_heart_heat)))))

exits.Fire Boss Room:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and 
                ((logic_fire_boss_door_jump and
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat))))) or
                (Hover_Boots and
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (unknown_heart_heat))))) or
                (at('Fire Temple Upper', can_play(Song_of_Time) or has_explosives) and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest: is_adult and (has_explosives or Megaton_Hammer or Hookshot)

events.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door:
((Bombs and
                    (can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat))))) or
                    (logic_fire_mq_blocked_chest and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat))))) or
                (has_bombchus and
                    (can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))) or
                    (logic_fire_mq_blocked_chest and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))))
events.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Torches:
(Bow and
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))) or
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat))))) or
                (logic_fire_mq_bk_chest and can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat))))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Big Lava Room Blocked Doo:
'Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door' and has_fire_source and
                ((can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))) or
                (logic_fire_mq_blocked_chest and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))))

exits.Fire Lower Maze:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 2) and
                ((can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))) or
                (logic_fire_mq_climb and can_use(Hover_Boots) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (unknown_heart_heat)))))
exits.Fire Boss Key Room:
'Fire Temple Big Lava Room Torches' and
                    ((can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))) or
                    (logic_fire_song_of_time and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                        (three_heart_heat)))))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Lizalfos Maze Side Room C: has_explosives and (logic_fire_mq_maze_side_room or at('Fire Upper Maze', True))

exits.Fire Upper Maze:
((has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches) and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                (logic_fire_mq_maze_hovers and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or logic_fire_mq_maze_jump

locations.Fire Temple MQ GS Skull On Fire:
(can_play(Song_of_Time) and can_use(Hookshot) and (has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches)) or
                can_use(Longshot)
locations.Wall Fairy:
has_bottle and
                ((can_play(Song_of_Time) and can_use(Hookshot) and (has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches)) or
                    can_use(Longshot))
